summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganExtreme Firming Eye Cream by Ahava is a patented combination of natural ingredients that creates a revolution in anti-aging skincare for the eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsPromotes firmnessReduces wrinkles around the eyesProvides intense hydrationFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2242236How To UseUsing your ring finger, apply a pea-size amount around the eye area and massage in a circular counter-clockwise motion. For A.M. and P.M. use.IngredientsAqua (Mineral Spring Water), Caprylyl Glycol & 1,2 Hexanediol & Sodium Hyaluronate & Aqua (Water), Cyclopentasiloxane & PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Silica & HDI/Trimethylol Hexyl-lactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone & Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Soy Polyglycerides & C15-23 Alkane, Butylene Glycol & Hydroxyethylcellulose & Sorbitan Laurate & Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Isohexadecane, Glycerin, Cyclomethicone & Propylene Carbonate Quaternium-18 Hectorite, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Cetraria Islandica (Iceland Moss) Extract, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin & Palmitoyl Tripeptide -38, Geranylgeranylpropanol & Caprylic/capric triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane & Dimethiconol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Squalene (Phytosqualene), C30-45 Alkyldimethylsilyl Polypropylsilsesquioxane, CI 77891 & MICA, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin, Maris Aqua (Dead Sea Water), Pentaerythrityl Stearate/Caprate/Caprylate/Adipate, Alanine & Caprylyl Glycol & Xanthan Gum & Ethylhexylglycerin & Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract & Proline & Sodium Phosphate & Sodium Hydroxide & Serine, Lycium Barbarum (Tibetan Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Rubus Ellipiticus (Himalayan Raspbery) Root Extract, Octyldodecyl PCA, Allantoin, Dunaliella Salina (Dead Sea Alga) Extract & Hydrogenated Polydecene, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Fruit Extract, Disodium Lauriminodipropionate Tocopheryl Phospates, Porphyridium Polysaccharide, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate.
how_to_use: Using your ring finger, apply a pea-size amount around the eye area and massage in a circular counter-clockwise motion. For A.M. and P.M. use.
ingredients: Butylene Glycol & Hydroxyethylcellulose & Sorbitan Laurate & Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester
Alanine & Caprylyl Glycol & Xanthan Gum & Ethylhexylglycerin & Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract & Proline & Sodium Phosphate & Sodium Hydroxide & Serine
Lycium Barbarum (Tibetan Goji Berry) Fruit Extract
Dunaliella Salina (Dead Sea Alga) Extract & Hydrogenated Polydecene

reviews.headline: Actually helped
reviews.comments: I was skeptical about using any creams for my face but my eye area started to get dry even with using my cerave moisturizer so i bought this product and they have not been dry since and my under eyes definitely look brighter too.

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments: Adds moisture without feeling greasy. Also works well under other products

reviews.headline: Non irritating and very effective
reviews.comments: I have tried many different eye creams and they either cause my eyes to water or aren't effective.  This cream absorbs quickly, firms the eye area and softens lines.  Never any irritation.  Love it.

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments:
I really wanted to love this even like it but , it made my eyes water and burn so bad. I tried on 3 different occasions to make sure it wasn't something else and just using alone at night did the same thing. My eyes swoll , reddened and kept pouring tears like I was was balling my eyes out. When I would wake up they would be so icky. 
The texture is nice.  The smell is not over welming, I don't know why I couldn't use it . I will be returning and hopefully finding something else I can use .

reviews.headline: I Love this product.
reviews.comments: this is the best product I have found to help with the elasticity under my eyes and it is not to expensive!!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Best eye cream purchased in a long time. Doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes and helps with fine lines and puffiness around eyes. I use it morning and night.

reviews.headline: A little goes a.long way
reviews.comments: It is a good product. Use only a dot the size of a pencil eraser for each eye.

reviews.headline: First eye cream I've purchased more than once.
reviews.comments: I use this 1-2 times per day.  I starting needing an eye cream a couple of years ago and have been very dissatisfied with all the brands I've purchased.  They either make my eyes water, cause redness and irritation on the skin around my eyes or leave a sticky residue.  This cream does none of the above and yet I've noticed a major reduction in the appearance of wrinkles and crows feet.  I also had a lot of dryness around my eyes which disappeared within just a few days of using this cream.  It's very pleasant to use and effective.

reviews.headline: I received open
reviews.comments: i received the procuct in a box that wasn't sealed with tape & the cover was so loose ot was almost off, with it looks like a junk of product removed.

reviews.headline: Yes! Finally!
reviews.comments: I finally found something that's helping with dark circles & lines. My husband even noticed!

reviews.headline: I'll believe it, when I see it.
reviews.comments:
I'm roughly 4 weeks into consistently using this product (apply in the morning and at night). I have to say, I'm not seeing that much of a difference. My under eyes look exactly the same (did a side by side of my own face). I'll give this product another month of consistent use and if my overall experience changes, I'll change my review (As of 4/11/2021). 

I will say this: I read a lot of reviews that talks about an odor to the cream itself. To me, I do not smell a thing. I'd almost describe this product as odorless. 

Also, if price is an issue for you, the little jar WILL last you a long time. I could see an individual getting roughly several months of use with just this one little jar.

reviews.headline: The best eye cream
reviews.comments: This is my 3rd or 4th purchase. It's the best eye cream in my opinion. I've tried millions other ones (dermalogica, strivectin, etc just name it) and this is the one. It's very moisturizing without being too greasy. Defiantly see a huge improvement on the crow feet under my eye area, they are still there unfortunately but with this magical cream less prominent. The best cream for winter and summer times.
reviews.location: In the middle of nowhere Aka NH

reviews.headline: should be able to give a negative star!
reviews.comments: This  product smells so strong.  It burned my face!  I returned this and all the ahave products I purchased because of the strong smell!!!

reviews.headline: On my third jar
reviews.comments: This stuff is great for long term smoothing and brightening. A little goes a long way so one jar will last me several months. I wait until it goes on sale to buy it because I never pay full price for anything. I put it on every night and let it do it's thing.

reviews.headline: MIRACLE CREAM
reviews.comments:
the TOP picture was taken 2018 with 2 layers of concealer on!! You can see how bad my under eye is. 

the Bottom picture was taken 2020 with no make up on. For reference I am 28 years old. It's Honestly amazing!!! Just wish it wasn't so pricey.

reviews.headline: works wonders!
reviews.comments: Really like this! its my first one and I am so in love, I alternate between this and a different under eye cream on some day since this is kind of pricey. I can always tell the days I uses this vs when I don't

reviews.headline: Very good eye cream
reviews.comments: I had been using Olay Ultimate Eye cream for a few years but it was not giving me the results that I wanted. After reading many of the reviews I decided to try this product when it was on sale. I have noticed a huge difference in my under eye area. The skin is much more supple and I notice fewer lines. Also really helps when my under-eye area is puffy. My eye area is very sensitive but this cream does not bother me at all. I wish I could use it on my eyelids but it makes my eyeshadow crease even when I use a base. Also makes my mascara leave black dots on my eyelids. But at night I can use it all over my eye area and they look so great in the morning. Even though this cream is pricey (3 times what I was paying for Olay), I don't need to use very much cream to get the benefit so this will last a long time. Also I'm seeing results so it makes sense to put my money in a product that works.

reviews.headline: My favorite product!!!
reviews.comments: Love this product!!! It's a bit pricey but worth every penny!!

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: I was hesitant to buy this due to the price but wow. Worth every cent! Seriously... I'm 25 and I even seen a difference! The only thing I would change is the packaging. I opened it up and it exploded :/ cream went every where.

reviews.headline: Best eye cream for mature sensitive eyes!!
reviews.comments: I apply it morning and night to my sensitive eyes, and it has improved the darkness, and sagginess under my eyes!!! People wonder why I don't have crow's feet, it's because of this magical eye cream!! It works well under makeup, and doesn't cause me those white bumps under skin. I have tried very high end, to medium eye creams, and this eye cream is the best Ive found!!! Also has a nice light fragrance, as I'm sensitive to smells!! Please never discontinue this amazing product!!!!

media.headline: MIRACLE CREAM
media.caption: the TOP picture was taken 2018 with 2 layers of concealer on!! You can see how bad my under eye is.   the Bottom picture was taken 2020 with no make up on. For reference I am 28 years old.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've written several reviews but never a 2nd review... well I felt necessary with this Ahava eye cream. I've seen other reviews of this not working, I don't understand. I'm going on 40 in a few more months. I've tried so many eye creams, serums, Etc (I always try each one several different ways to give a fair shot...morning, night, under make up, with no make up...if I can see a result Great! But I've always seen little or no results...nothing to jump for joy about even with creams/serums in the $150 range). This cream is it!! My first review was a day after using this eye Cream (I know, that's a little soon to write a review but I honestly saw results in the crows feet and wrinkles starting to peek out under my eyes quickly). However, been about months and I am so excited for finding this cream now! For any of the negative reviews I'm thinking its maybe because it was applied in the morning? Or possibly under make up? This cream is pretty thick and luxurious, I do not recommend at day or under make up personally (tried that and I feel it works at its best potential at night). After several experiments the winning way I found to use it is as a eye mask at night! I apply a decent amount under each eye..but (this is important) do not rub it in all the way...I apply it in a mask like manner (it will look like a thin white layer under your eyes, also covering the crows feet area) and let it sink in overnight...I wake up in AM and WOW. My eyes are absolutely firmer and brighter in the morning. The crows feet that had been very visible in pictures for over a year now (seriously) are GONE. So impressed. I've bought two back ups and plan and getting one more this week. Use it this way. It WORKS!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Update!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm 55, with good skin (the reward for oily skin in my teens and 20's) but have wrinkles in my undereye area that I try to minimize.  I will invest in a pricey product if it works, and the reviews here convinced me to try it. After using it day and night for two months, I returned it.  It made my undereye area drier, and my crinkles and wrinkles were more visible, especially under concealer.  I even tried different concealers, and setting powder vs. no setting powder, but I am convinced that it was this cream.  I went back to Mario Badescu Hyaluronic Eye Cream for a third of the price.  Looks much better.
faceoff_negative.headline: Had high hopes but . . .
